dt-option.name: language.searchBuilder.right
dt-option.summary: Set the text of the SearchBuilder right button

type.description: `-init language.searchBuilder.right` changes the text of the SearchBuilder right button.

dt-option.description:
As standard, SearchBuilder will set the right button's text to `'>'`.
The value of `-init language.searchBuilder.right` is passed into an `-api i18n()` function.

example.title: Change the SearchBuilder right button's text
